snippet: The United States men’s basketball team is winning without James taking many shots. It throttled Nigeria, 156-73, and James did not play in the second half.
abstract: Greg Bishop On Basketball column observes that the United States men’s basketball team is winning without lots of scoring from LeBron James, who is excelling in the role of facilitator; notes that the US throttled Nigeria, 156-73.
lead_paragraph: The United States men’s basketball team is winning without James taking many shots. It throttled Nigeria, 156-73, and James did not play in the second half.

headline.seo: LeBron James Is Happy to Dish Off During U.S. Feast
headline.main: LeBron James Is Content With Dishing Off During U.S. Feast
headline.print_headline: James Is Content With Dishing Off During Feast
